website_summaries.verdict: A sufficient cable lock for many situations, though the plastic housing could break away.
pros: Good cable diameter for such a lightweight lock
Setting and resetting the lock combination is easy
Mounting bracket easily fits standard cylindrical frames
cons: A few reports of lock housing or end caps breaking
Lock tumblers may not work well in freezing conditions
Cable could potentially be cut with bolt cutters

customer_reviews.title: Thief proof
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! Someone just stole a bunch of bikes in my neighborhood by cutting locks, but they weren't able to get through mine. I'll have to buy a new one because they did a number on it -- but thankful I had this lock!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Levins

customer_reviews.title: Really good, recommended even at a higher price.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these now, one for me and then my wife wanted one too. The locks feel really nice and work smoothly. I would imagine that a dedicated thief could bust it open with the right tools, but that's true for any lock. I really like the mounting clip. I was able to find a convenient spot on both our bikes to mount them. However, on my bike I did need to replace the screws with longer ones to be able to make it fit. If your bike has really thick bars it might be a bit less convenient, but you'll most likely be able to make it work. For the price, I am exceptionally happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. garlans

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted longer than a stroller! Bought it to lock my double stroller outside, easy to use did the job, unfortunately stroller broke... but lock still good, after staying out all winter.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Lock is great and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. It is extremely strong and easy to operate. No problem with setting the combination and operating. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LO HOPKINS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my pool ladder. works well and no issues being left out in the elements constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. the size and the lengh of this lock work better thab expected
customer_reviews.author: MGranados

customer_reviews.title: really glad i bought it
customer_reviews.text: Someone tried to steal my bike a day after I bought this, really glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: TheValkyrieAsh

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy this useless lock. I had my grandsons bike locked so ...
customer_reviews.text: If you care about your bike, don’t buy this useless lock. I had my grandsons bike locked so he wouldn’t take off without letting me know. He’s 10 yrs old. In two seconds, he took a pair of pliers, on single pair and his hand, and twisted the lock snapping “steel” locking key right off. Thankfully it was him and not some kid at school stealing the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kepela

customer_reviews.title: Approved
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount (you'll need a screwdriver, either kind), easy to set your own code (took me 30 seconds) and seems to do exactly what is supposed to. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: SRoc

customer_reviews.title: Classical combo lock. Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Though in the winter this lock can freeze, if you bike only in nice weather you're fine. Small. Compact. Good customer support. Fast delivery. Good for price. In my local bike shop cheapest lock is 30 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the ease of setting the combination. Thought the product was likely to be of low quality since it was so reasonably priced. Not so. Good quality and easy to use. I can finally stop using my key lock. I kept forgetting to take the key with me when I rode to the store. I'd lock up my bike, shop, and end up walking home to retrieve the key. Duhhhh . . . No more danger of that as long as I don't forget the combo.
customer_reviews.author: kp40

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE- customer service is excellent:) Bad crimp? cable pulled apart by 10 year old..
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the lock was good untill my 10 year old pulled on it and the cable separated from the lock. Looks like when they crimped the cable, they missed the cable.... and that allowed it to be pulled apart easily.... better check yours.....UPDATE.. company replaced the lock quickly. Checked and no further problems found. There customer service was excellent:)
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a bit longer. Surprisingly, most ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a bit longer. Surprisingly, most people don't realize that they need to wrap the cable AROUND or THROUGH the body/ frame of the bike. Not just through the metal part that attaches the front wheel. That slips right off when a thief unscrews the front wheel. Anyone who wants to steal your bike usually makes the decision to remove the front wheel and steal the remainder of the bike, because thats the most valuable part. You'd be surprised how any people just don't seem to grasp this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Price

customer_reviews.title: Easier to operate.
customer_reviews.text: "Very pleased with shipping, packaging and product" To bed honest, I bought this as a replacement for a similar lock I lost and it was the least expensive brand that included a mount for storing on my bike. I am pleasantly surprised to find it has a more sunbstantial, easier to read and operate roll lock than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Short, but well designed
customer_reviews.text: Great, cheap bike lock. I like the mount for the seat. I have to say, I was surprised how short the chain really was. Because it's coiled you can never really get the full length, so I would say if you're going to be locking your bike to anything other than a bike stand or a fence you should opt for a longer chain (it didn't reach around my column and I doubt it would fit around a fence post.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel M

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought one several months ago for my folding bike. It works well, so I just bought another one to use on my touring bike, replacing an old chain and padlock that I've had for too long. I've read some complaints about the lock holder breaking. I can see how that would easily happen if you over tighten the mounting screws.
customer_reviews.author: T. Connor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay lock. Just as described and arrived on time. The quality is not the best, but that was expected given the price. They have a great customer service so if something is wrong with your lock you can contact them and they will help you. I have been using this lock for the past couple of months on my college campus and had no problems with it yet. I will see how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Seller Customer Service is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Revised Review: I purchased this lock July of 2017 and really enjoyed the functionality of it. It attached easily to my handlebars and was simple to set a password, wrap through my bike frame, and lock. The unlock process is also quite easy, even in the dark. The Length is perfect for all normal uses. I would recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wire

customer_reviews.title: easy to program and use.
customer_reviews.text: we bought four for our kids to use. I like the programable nature of them. we set them all to the same number so that it didnt mater if the kids mixed them up. you can also link them all together to make one big bike chain. easy to use and program. we have not used the connector piece for hanging it on the bike when you are not using the chain.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: After a few months sometimes it stuck and make it difficult to open. Update A few minutes later I write my first review they contact me to explain why could sometimes get stuck the lock and also decided to refound me the amount. Excellent costumer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Smith

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't use it if your in an area that has a lot of bike thefts because they look easy to cut
customer_reviews.text: Plastic covering fell off but still works well. As expected with a bike lock this cheap. I wouldn't use it if your in an area that has a lot of bike thefts because they look easy to cut. Not a lot of thefts where I am from so it's not as big of a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike lock
customer_reviews.text: This lock has an awesome mount to attach to your bike so you always have your lock with you. The lock itself recoils up so it keeps its shape. All in all a great bike lock. I use it to lock up my bike, and my child bike when we go around town.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Ram-Toe

customer_reviews.title: Don't Kid Yourself
customer_reviews.text: This "lock" can be literally ripped apart at the connection between the combination lock and cable. I lost my bike to a thief via this method. Bike was gone and the "lock" was left dangling on the bike rake. Didn't even need to be cut, just yanked apart. Don't delude yourself and think your bike is safe using this lock. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: GJS

customer_reviews.title: This one's a sleeper, great quality! great price! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Was not expecting too much from this lock due to cheap price. Completely under estimated. Lock is substantial in build, clamp appears sturdy and tumblers flawless in operation. Cable appears quite substantial. NIce packaging. Comes securely sealed in plastic enclosed in cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: trianj

customer_reviews.title: Very short cable lock
customer_reviews.text: I’m keeping the lock because I need different types of locks frequently and it’s more of a pain to return it, but read the specs carefully, because it’s a very short cable, the shortest cable lock I’ve ever owned (and I’ve owned many). I thought the lengths were standard!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought to of these for my wife's bike and my bike, after using them 3 times they both broke, poor build quality UPDATE: the seller contacted me about this product and was very generous in sending replacement parts. I will add 2 more stars to this review for the great customer service alone. Thanks for making your customers feel important
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I tried to tie up my bike yesterday and the entire end that connects to the lock had fallen out of the lock mechanism rendering the lock completely useless. There was no way to repair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in July and have literally used it 3 times. I tried to tie up my bike yesterday and the entire end that connects to the lock had fallen out of the lock mechanism rendering the lock completely useless. There was no way to repair. I guess you get what you pay for. I have no confidence in this product protecting your bike from theft! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Mounting Bracket Cracked but Customer Support Pulled Through
customer_reviews.text: Update AUG2018: The manufacturer reached out to me and asked for more information regarding the mounting bracket. I provided them with a description of what happened and they sent me a new bracket. All has been working fine for now. I appreciate the support the manufacturer has provided and their commitment to stand behind their product and customers. ------- The bike lock has worked fine for us thus far; however, the mounting bracket cracked and is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: JayFree

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I used it today just before my bike was stolen... Okay, I'm kidding. The lock worked and my bike wasn't stolen. It was easy to set up and use. My bike is so cheap I actually am more afraid of the lock being stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Shevy

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. It's not so large and long that it loops around and gets caught up in everything. It's just right. Also, if we store our bikes close together, though not too large, we can actually lock up the two very well. It works well. No one has ever tried to steal our bikes, so not sure how easily it can be broken into - I did have some kids around here try - they were unsuccessful. But, as far as I can tell, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Helene-joy N.

customer_reviews.title: Large easy-to-spin numbers, solid mid-weight lock
customer_reviews.text: We needed a simple lock for an elementary schooler riding his bike to school every day. This is perfect. I have no idea how this would stand up to organized bike thieves with lock cutters but we don't have that issue around here. It is a solidly effective deterrent to opportunist criminals.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a second lock
customer_reviews.text: Wrote a 2 star review due to lock and mounting bracket being bad. seller contacted me and sent a second one for no charge. The second one I have haf no issues with, the mounting bracket is functional. This is definitely not a 5 star lock, as it is inexpensive, but it does work for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B.

customer_reviews.title: Junk - used 2x/week for 3 months before breaking
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Used approximately twice a week for 3 months, then cable pulled out of one end. Never fully extended or otherwise stretched cable tight
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Do not get! Cheap and Broken within a few months
customer_reviews.text: This item should be renamed to "permanent lock forever". My bike is locked stuck at a grocery store and will not release with correct code. I rarely use my bike and got this lock 5 months ago (I keep my bike inside so there are no weather related issues to blame for the problem) - I noticed it became oddly difficult to jimmy it open the night before. Don't get this its not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: nice lock, excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The first lock I received was somewhat defective, but Amazer contacted me directly and offered me a replacement or refund. The replacement arrived in less than a week, and it is perfect. Nice quality, attractive design, easy to program the combination. It's just right for my light-duty needs. I'd purchase from them again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! I love the little holder as well
customer_reviews.text: I used this lock this weekend when camping. It worked great! I love the little holder as well. I put it right under the back of my seat. so easy to use. Just remember your code to unlock! Its a very strong lock. I did notice the plastic cover close to the number kept unclipping and sliding down but it didnt effect the lock and it purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Yaus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and solid lock!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 of these for our children's bikes. The are easy to use and work well. My six year old was able to pick his combination code and can easily work the lock. It is a solid bike cable lock. The cable is substantial and the tumblers are easy to turn and use. Perfect for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best bike lock we've ever had. It's strong and easy to program. It's amazing value for the price. I can't recommend it highly enough. I received the lock in 2 days and was impressed with the note that the company enclosed asking for feedback. That's rare.
customer_reviews.author: Silka

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, even greater weapon
customer_reviews.text: I got this bike lock expecting it to be like all of the others, safe, economical, efficient. It was. Using it as a bike lock has allowed me to travel far and wide with peace of mind, knowing that my bike will be safe when bound fast to a pole. In retrospect, it is a very one sided tool, as this bike lock does not work well as a jump rope, but let it be known that it is very effective when used as a whip in a Roman war re-enactment. The plebeians stood no chance against the might of the Roman empire.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: ... buy this thing if you are in cold climate like New York
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this thing if you are in cold climate like New York. I have to park my bike outside and when you come back the lock is frozen and you can't untie it. Better buy something that has a rigid U shaped structure. Long story short, today the plastic coating broke and the chain became open when I tried to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst cable! Cut easily! Bike disappeared
customer_reviews.text: I thought the main use of this cable was to prevent my bike to be stolen... then... for sure it is not, it might be just an ornament^^ Please dont buy this cable!! It has been cut very easily it seems, and my bike is gone...
customer_reviews.author: Giordanengo Rémi

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy, easy to use cable lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, easy to use cable lock. The combination is simple to set up and there are multiple ways to stow it on your bicycle while traveling. I wrap mine under the seat, but the mounting bracket included seems like it would provide be good too!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H Eggers

customer_reviews.title: Really a Great Bike Lock
customer_reviews.text: So happy that I bought this new bike lock. It is easy to use and works great. We have been having bikes stolen in the neighborhood recently and this is just what I needed. Also, thank you for the email with instructions for setting the combination!
customer_reviews.author: Silvermoon447

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in summer 2017, within a few months it broke, the cable having torn out of the plastic piece that has the number dials. I'm going to spend a bit more and hopefully get a decent lock.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Don

customer_reviews.title: Quit good, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Quit good, and reliable. No one has tried to steal my bike, but that was in Florida. Now I am Sacramento...Bike Theft Capital of the US. Maybe another review will be forthcoming in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Good product, for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bike lock gets the job done. It's definitely not highend and I wouldn't trust it for an expensive bike, but it's great for keeping my rusty old beach cruiser out of the hands of a homeless person. I do really like the mount that was included, it's very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: SBurk

customer_reviews.title: Completely un-usable
customer_reviews.text: The lock arrived broken. I will not close properly, let alone lock. It is completely un-usable and I cant even return the item for a refund because shipping alone is $5 so I will only be refunded like $3
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great  for added protection without a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: I am using this lock to protect my front tire. It is light weight and a small length so perfect. Note this is not a good lock to secure an actual bike. It wouldn't be hard to break. It should be good enough to discourage a passerby from taking a tire however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, some build quality opportunities.
customer_reviews.text: It does the basic job of locking the bike. It's easy to use and locks nicely into the bracket that it comes with. The only drawback is that the plastic cowlings that connects to the two ends that lock together quickly separated and now float along the cable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: The cable is super heavy but the end clamp on the heavy clam ...
customer_reviews.text: lasted a month then the dial end fell off while riding the bike while the lock was not under load. The cable is super heavy but the end clamp on the heavy clam was pathetic. 4ft is not enough 4.5ft would be much better and since cable is so heavy it takes a significant force to get it to stretch out when its <40F The seller responded quickly and resolved my problems with the product. Hope it was just a one off issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cheap bike and this lock is perfect for it. I bought it in May, now it started to stick slightly before unlocking, but with a little wiggle it pulls right out.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Ejam

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Security
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time and intact. Great price, convenient service, product exactly as expected...what else would you want? Side note: This is not for high security -- use it for casual lockup situations when you are close by. It is easily bypassed.
customer_reviews.author: Egger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Good lock..as long as the plastic end doesn't get bumped or twisted to reset the combination - we will see.... Update after a year so far so good. Bike actually got stolen with lock on it! But guess they carried it away. Bought another of these. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: My bike was just stolen with this lock!
customer_reviews.text: My bike was just stolen with this lock in the daylight. Don't waste your money. Instead buy the U lock. That is what I am buying for my next bike!
customer_reviews.author: Bijan

customer_reviews.title: Cable pulls out of lock housing
customer_reviews.text: The cable pulled out of the lock housing when I was taking it off my bike, it just pulled free... The chain was only about 4 months old. Not safe and definitely not good protection for my bike. Dealing with Amazer, however, was great. They quickly addressed my problem and made sure that I was satisfied with my purchase. A quality company.
customer_reviews.author: James B Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great bike lock
customer_reviews.text: Great bike lock. good price and very strong lock. The mount for the lock does not fit my bike at all. I had to mount it to the bike wheel. but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low security.  Deterrent only.
customer_reviews.text: Not secure (easy to find the combination by feel) but a fine cheap, quick deterrent. I use it to lock my helmet to my bike because no one's going to put in that much effort for a helmet. But I would not use it to lock my bike or anything worth over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Knflrpn

customer_reviews.title: seems like I'm not the only one with this issue
customer_reviews.text: Lock detached from cable while unlocking it. While I understand this is not a high security lock, it should not fall apart during regular use. The cable end is poorly swedged to locking mechanism(see pic). This happened after having the lock a little over a month & using it about 10 times. Looking at recent reviews, seems like I'm not the only one with this issue. After leaving a review, I received an email from the seller offering a refund or a new lock,went with the refund
customer_reviews.author: bq

customer_reviews.title: Works good but a bit bulkier than i expected
customer_reviews.text: Works good but a bit bulkier than i expected. Should have gotten one of the slightly smaller ones. But, it does the job and is easy to set the combination and lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: jnkcruse

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I was going to like the hanger
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. I didn't think I was going to like the hanger, but I do. I would give it 5 stars, but the hanger needs to be a larger diameter to fit other places on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Neusiis

customer_reviews.title: Get a more expensive one might be a better option. If you live in a safe area ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my bycicle after using this cable lock...it does not really handle someone well planed to steal your bike... Get a more expensive one might be a better option. If you live in a safe area and just wanna keep naughty kid away from your bike, ignore what I wrote above.
customer_reviews.author: Hanzhao

customer_reviews.title: failed!
customer_reviews.text: my son's bike was stolen while this bike lock was "securing" his bike. The cable was cut and the lock left on the ground...wish we would have purchased a more secure bike lock
customer_reviews.author: janet k coleman

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues! Easy to set up initial password, and super easy to carry around the bike bar.
customer_reviews.author: NSAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Other use for bike lock
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bike lock. I used it to keep my walker from walking away! LOL. Used a walker on a trip and didn't want to take it inside every shop or store. Used the lock to secure it. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy. I tried pulling the lock apart
customer_reviews.text: The plastic rims on the side of lock detached. not sturdy. I tried pulling the lock apart, and instead the plastic brackets broke off
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Lock combination was easy to set (it doesn’t come with a pre-chosen combo)
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected, used immediately upon arrival. Lock combination was easy to set (it doesn’t come with a pre-chosen combo). I like how easy it is to change in case I need to update the combo quickly. Very sturdy cable, was able to lock two bikes together with this cable lock.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It's too easy to accidentally change the code
customer_reviews.text: Edit: The company contacted me very quickly after I posted, and they offered me a new lock or a refund. They took care of my choice immediately, and I'm happy with the outcome. It's too easy to accidentally change the code. Yep, finally had to have it cut off to free my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Yikes

customer_reviews.title: Good Lock
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock on my helmet. Very easy to use so far. I like how it coils for storage in side arm bag. Takes little space and that is helpful. I would recommend this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy, quality
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and attach to the bike with a simple screwdriver, it's a positive that it attaches without permanent damage to the bike, will be easy to remove if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The steel core is only 6 mm in diameter.
customer_reviews.text: Read the Product Description carefully – “12 mm diameter with vinyl shell”. The steel core is only 6 mm in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: DirectGG

customer_reviews.title: Almost everyone has the same type of lock when owning ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost everyone has the same type of lock when owning a scooter and uses it for the same thing. It's the safest way to travel when parking your bike and going about your business for a long time...
customer_reviews.author: DavidNervilHAT

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: lock gets stuck sometimes but definitely still good and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Yana Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Lock seems good, however it gets tangled up inbetween legs and causes you to hit your legs on it when riding
customer_reviews.text: Really great cable lock, seems thick enough to ward off theft, and the holder is definitely a great addition, it just sits in the center part of my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: easy to use- I put it on the jogging stroller
customer_reviews.text: easy to use- I put it on the jogging stroller. I love that it stays on the stroller in its own brace until I need it & that I can use whatever numbers I want.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Lock jammed after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: This lock simply stopped working after five uses. The combo dials jammed and fell apart. Tried the second lock after the first fell apart thinking it might be a fluke. Nope the exact same thing happened. I would not recommend this lock at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after first use, dial with numbers is stuck, I was lucky to be able to force open lock after first time or i would have been stranded with bike locked. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value and use
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a lock - arrived on time as expected. Love that I can program the code myself. A little heavy for my purposes (stroller lock).
customer_reviews.author: CC NYC

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with lock and we still have the bike so ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting a bike lock and was very specific about it. He is happy with lock and we still have the bike so it must be working ;)
customer_reviews.author: Melissab97

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy and its worth the price. Setup was simple and installation to my bike was also simple. I would recommend this bike lock!
customer_reviews.author: Shenton

customer_reviews.title: great value and love the way it mounts
customer_reviews.text: great value and love the way it mounts. i ended up putting on my rear swing arm because of no room on the seat post. can mount many places to the bike and simple to set code. cant go wrong
customer_reviews.author: mike t

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I don't need the mount adapter clip but it stays wrapped around the bike easy enough. The locking mechanism clicks into place better than my other cable lock and it's easier to reset the combo too.
customer_reviews.author: James Strutz

customer_reviews.title: Great until it breaks after less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this lock. It was easy to carry, no keys that can get lost and the cable was the perfect length. However after less than two month of moderate usage (once or twice per week), the lock separated from the cable and it can't be used anymore (see picture). It simply fell off when I tried to lock my bike to a post. Yes it's cheap, but I expected it to last at least one season.
customer_reviews.author: Anna F

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4 Feet  -  cable is actually less then 3.5 ft
customer_reviews.text: The length of the cable is actually 41 inches. The length of the cable and the lock itself is 48 inches.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My daughters bike wad stolen within a few months of buying this. They cut right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Longanbach

customer_reviews.title: These bike likes are PERFECT for my elementary school aged kids
customer_reviews.text: These bike likes are PERFECT for my elementary school aged kids. They loved setting their own combination and they are just long enough to lock two bikes together if someone forgets their lock. So far we haven't installed the lock mount to the bike, but we haven't needed to.
customer_reviews.author: DACB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and easy to take on and off. The numbers slide really smoothly and it hooks perfectly to by bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tati

customer_reviews.title: Good cable and lock, great service
customer_reviews.text: The cable and lock worked fine, but the clip that holds it just sheared off so I had to carry the cable around loose. However the Amazer representative saw my complaint, contacted me and offered an immediate replacement for the clip, without my asking, so they get 5 stars for service!
customer_reviews.author: Mr A.

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely long and does the work. Isn't the best quality, but then again it's great for the price you get it at.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Bhatt

customer_reviews.title: stronger than I expected actually good quality. price was very competitive
customer_reviews.text: arrived very quickly, it's as strong as can be..stronger than I expected actually good quality. price was very competitive, has all features described I commend the seller ...keep up the good work it's how you build customers and a strong business,,, 5 stars. Definitely would buy from this seller again and buy the product again
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Don't buy.  But very good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Complete piece of $@)#. Used for two months, pulled away from the lock. Don't buy. UPDATE: Company offered me replacement for free after reading this review , have used twice and tested the crimp from lock body to cord by pulling on it, seems to be a better crimp.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two items...both were defective!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two items...both were defective! Both locks failed within two weeks!!! On both locks the coated cable pulled out of the end that is inserted into the combo lock end... FINALLY, after numerous e-mails full refund received
customer_reviews.author: The Right Price

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use, customer service was great
customer_reviews.text: I used this ONCE for maybe 5 minutes. When I got to work this morning, I reached down to take it off the bike and lock it up and the cable had disconnected from the lock part. Completely unusable. I dont know if i got a dud or what, but I would appreciate a replacement. EDIT: Very happy, not only did I get a refund but I also got a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use and it is light weight which is great too. I highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Moran

customer_reviews.title: Bike Cable Lock, Amazer 4 foot
customer_reviews.text: Got it for locking mobility scooter, easy to use and the holder comes in handy. Good to not have another key.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: "Excellent value.... quality product and great price. I reordered a second one for a different bike."
customer_reviews.author: az

customer_reviews.title: Great bike lock
customer_reviews.text: Great bike lock, love that it has an attachment for the bike and that it maintains its self cool for easy storage while biking. Very easy resent capabilities and nice combo dial, easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: The cable is quite stiff so to move around sometimes is hard but they are made to be like that. Not flexible so it can give protection
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed too. Perfet for my basement to lock. The cable is quite stiff so to move around sometimes is hard but they are made to be like that. Not flexible so it can give protection.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela

customer_reviews.title: LOCK IT UP...GREAT LOCK AND CABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits on bike post great. Coils nicely. Easy to reset combination. Dial is nice and big and easy to turn.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected with very easy to use instructions. Make sure you buy the length you need. 4ft is very short but will work for the right bike.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk. After I set my own code ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. After I set my own code it worked ONCE. Never opened after thank. Thank God I didn't get stuck somewhere with a lock that refused to open!
customer_reviews.author: Bell

product_meta.title: Bike Cable Lock, Amazer 4-Feet Bike Lock Basic Self Coiling Resettable Combination Cable Bike Locks with Mounting Bracket, 4 Feet x 1/2 Inch
feature_bullets: GOOD PERFORMANCE CABLE LOCK: Flexible steel cables for strong cut resistance and PVC coating helps prevent scratching and keeping more durable
MULTI-PURPOSE: Ideal for bicycles, skateboards, gates & fences, grills & lawnmowers, sports equipment, tool boxes & ladders
RESETTABLE & CONVENIENCE: 4-Digit combination resettable coiling bike lock, easy to set your own personalized combination. With keyless convenience bike lock, no worry about the key lost/forget
ZINC ALLOY LOCK CYLINDER - the lock cylinder is made of zinc alloy, which is strengthened by the electroplating process which make the bike lock more Secure and durable
SECURE & PORTABLE: 4'(1.2m) long x 1/2" (12mm) diameter with vinyl shell
